entries.title: How a Grassroots Revolt in the Iconic Retirement Community Ended With a 72-Year-Old Political Prisoner
entries.description:
A slate of reformers unleashed the fury of the Florida GOP and its business elite, and left two men facing garbage felony charges.

The post How a Grassroots Revolt in the Iconic Retirement Community Ended With a 72-Year-Old Political Prisoner appeared first on The Intercept.
